title: Oceanic player
body:
I just join a rank game with 2 player: iComrade and his friend whitehesy, whitehesy was in position 1, he did not ban any hero and keep spamming some advertise. On the otherhand, icomrade is no better and he threaded in the beginning: "ADC of I will afk (feeding first)" I don't want to play so I quit out, what will happen now to this report, give me an anwser, it has been too long for Riot to work on the early report player, I don't want to spend 20~30 mins with those people only so I can report them.
P/s: I just join oceanic sever this year, so don't said I', racist or anything, I'm not.

replies.body: I'm in the seires to be up on league, what will I do, tell me.

Since you just joined the server I'm going to give you a heads up 
1) No one here can help you this the place where players congregate to talk %%%%.
2) The board rules state you aren't aloud to name and shame edit the names out then send a support ticket to riot if you're that concerned.
3) Dota2 is right if you don't want to spend 30 minutes with them don't just dodge.

{{item:3131}}
